```{r}
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)


news_csv <- "files/csvs/journalist_list.csv"
news <- read_csv(news_csv)

news <- news %>%
  mutate(Newspaper = sprintf("[%s](%s)", Newspaper, Link)) %>%
  select(-Link)

news %>%
  gt() %>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = Newspaper) %>%
  cols_label(
    Newspaper = ""
  ) %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Newspapers",
    subtitle = "Clink on name to view articles from that outlet"
  ) %>%
  opt_interactive(
    use_sorting = TRUE,
    use_search = TRUE,
    use_filters = FALSE,
    use_resizers = TRUE
  ) %>%
  opt_row_striping()

```
